      • getApplicationsByParam

        @PostMapping(value="/{language}/by/param",
             consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getApplicationsByParam(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                           ApplicationParamForm param,
                                                                                                                                                                           @PathVariable(value="language")
                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String language,
                                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Get applications by parameters
        Parameters:
        param - are the parameters to filter with
        language - of the applications' parameters
        bindingResult - handles validation of input from user
        Returns:
        collection of application and a http status or an error message

        Parameters:
        pageNmr - of the page to retrieve
        language - on applications' parameters
        pageSize - of a page (in applications)
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        id - of the application to change the status on
